Package it.polimi.se2019.Controller.Setup

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardSetup
    Creates the final board merging all the data coming from the other Setups classes.
    LootDeckSetup
    Builds all the loot instances.
    MapSetup
    Creates a map instance, gathering all the rooms.
    PowerUpDeckSetup
    Creates the deck containing all the power ups.
    WeaponDeckSetup
    Creates all the weapon cards and collects them on a Deck.
